column1: | elizabeth basso passed away on june 12
column2: 2015 in her 93rd year. she was born april 14
column3: 1922 in germany to josef karg and maria (nee) kinskofer. she was predeceased by her beloved husband august in 2002. devoted mother of raymond (kathy) and deborah schreyer. cherished grandmother of chris
column6: and angelica. she was very proud of her bavarian ancestry. she also loved socializing with her friends
column8: and her hummel collection. family and friends are invited to mc. nulty funeral home
column11: 2015 from 2:00 - 5:00 and 7:00 - 9:00 pm for visitation. a gathering of family and friends will be held for elizabeth at mc. nulty funeral home
